title: 2025 Tata Nexon gets a variant rejig, more features
description: The 2025 Tata Nexon has been launched at Rs 7.99 lakh. The refreshed compact SUV from Tata Motors gets a simplified variant list, new exterior paint shades, and more features in some variants. There are no mechanical changes, and the SUV continues to be available in petrol, diesel, EV and CNG powertrain options; however, the Nexon EV line-up is expected to continue as is for 2025. Apart from the 2025 Nexon, The company has also introduced refreshed iterations of the Tiago, Tiago EV and the Tigor compact sedan. The 2025 Nexon gets two new colour options, more features The Nexon EV line-up continues as is for 2025 2025 Tata Nexon features and equipment details First up, Tata Motors has added two new exterior paint shade options for the Nexon – Royale Blue and Grassland beige. Flame Red and Purple have been discontinued for the new version. The compact SUV continues with other paint options, including Calgary white, Ocean Blue, Daytona Grey and Pure Grey. As for variants, Tata Motors has reintroduced the Nexon Smart trim, priced at Rs 8 lakh, which replaces the Smart (O). The company has also added additional features to the 2025 Nexon's Smart+, Pure+, Creative, Creative+ PS, and Fearless+ PS trims. Priced at Rs 8 lakh, the Nexon Smart comes with features like six airbags, 16-inch wheels, multi drive modes, ISOFIX mounts, ESP, and front power windows, among other bits. The Nexon Smart+ gets standard wheel caps and key features like a 7-inch touchscreen, steering-mounted controls, paddle shifters for the automatic variant, and follow-me-home headlamps. This variant starts at Rs 8.90 lakh. The Nexon Pure+ comes with body-coloured door handles, a 10.25-inch infotainment screen with wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay, a height-adjustable driver’s seat, an HD rear-view camera, and electrically foldable wing mirrors. This variant is priced from Rs 9.70 lakh. The Nexon Creative also gets the 10.25-inch infotainment screen bundle, a 360-degree camera, cruise control, and push-button start. This variant starts at Rs 11 lakh. The newly added Creative+ S gets a panoramic sunroof, wireless charging, front fog lamps with a cornering function, a rear defogger and 60/40 rear split seats. The Creative + PS is priced at Rs 11.30 lakh. The Nexon Fearless+ PS continues to be the top-spec variant, with a starting price of Rs 14.70 lakh. It has features like a panoramic sunroof, ventilated front seats, a 10.25-inch infotainment screen and a 10.25-inch instrument cluster, leatherette seats and alloy wheels, among others. html:
The 2025 Tata Nexon also gets new colours and additional equipment in most variants.

The 2025 Tata Nexon has been launched at Rs 7.99 lakh. The refreshed compact SUV from Tata Motors gets a simplified variant list, new exterior paint shades, and more features in some variants. There are no mechanical changes, and the SUV continues to be available in petrol, diesel, EV and CNG powertrain options; however, the Nexon EV line-up is expected to continue as is for 2025. Apart from the 2025 Nexon, The company has also introduced refreshed iterations of the Tiago, Tiago EV and the Tigor compact sedan.

  • The 2025 Nexon gets two new colour options, more features
  • The Nexon EV line-up continues as is for 2025

2025 Tata Nexon features and equipment details

First up, Tata Motors has added two new exterior paint shade options for the Nexon – Royale Blue and Grassland beige. Flame Red and Purple have been discontinued for the new version. The compact SUV continues with other paint options, including Calgary white, Ocean Blue, Daytona Grey and Pure Grey.

As for variants, Tata Motors has reintroduced the Nexon Smart trim, priced at Rs 8 lakh, which replaces the Smart (O). The company has also added additional features to the 2025 Nexon's Smart+, Pure+, Creative, Creative+ PS, and Fearless+ PS trims.

Priced at Rs 8 lakh, the Nexon Smart comes with features like six airbags, 16-inch wheels, multi drive modes, ISOFIX mounts, ESP, and front power windows, among other bits. The Nexon Smart+ gets standard wheel caps and key features like a 7-inch touchscreen, steering-mounted controls, paddle shifters for the automatic variant, and follow-me-home headlamps. This variant starts at Rs 8.90 lakh.

The Nexon Pure+ comes with body-coloured door handles, a 10.25-inch infotainment screen with wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay, a height-adjustable driver’s seat, an HD rear-view camera, and electrically foldable wing mirrors. This variant is priced from Rs 9.70 lakh.

The Nexon Creative also gets the 10.25-inch infotainment screen bundle, a 360-degree camera, cruise control, and push-button start. This variant starts at Rs 11 lakh. The newly added Creative+ S gets a panoramic sunroof, wireless charging, front fog lamps with a cornering function, a rear defogger and 60/40 rear split seats. The Creative + PS is priced at Rs 11.30 lakh.

The Nexon Fearless+ PS continues to be the top-spec variant, with a starting price of Rs 14.70 lakh. It has features like a panoramic sunroof, ventilated front seats, a 10.25-inch infotainment screen and a 10.25-inch instrument cluster, leatherette seats and alloy wheels, among others.
